(* 																	
Author: Pieter van Baal, february 2005																	
Average costs per person per disease and average total costs per person specified by sex and age																	
These average costs are obtained by dividing the total costs per CZM (as calculated form the Dutch Costs of Illness 1999 study) by 																	
the number of citizens alive january 1 1999 (CBS MndStat 1999/6) 																	
More details about costs and economic evaluations with the CZM can be found in RIVM Report 260706002: Cost Effectiveness Analysis with the CZM																	
*)																	
	
Div: 1
